author: jimk
msg: HADOOP-2079 HADOOP-2056 Fix generated HLog, HRegion names

HLog.splitLog was generating incorrect file names, HRegion was generating file names that could be far too long especially for local file systems, HMaster had a race condition in which an old HLog would get split by two threads simultaneously.

author: bgoodin
msg: - added ability to provide a type attribute on selectKey using <generatedKey ... type="post"/>

- changed placeholder functionalithy to leave placeholder literals when they do not resolve to a property so ${myProperty} does not get changed to myProperty when it doesn't resolve. It is added to the sqlmap as ${myProperty}. This allows you to pass through properties that can be resolved with iBATIS.
- added behavior that if type is specified identity is automatically false on generatedKey
- updated dtd and made generatedKey identity #IMPLIED and type #IMPLIED

author: bspeakmon
msg: - fix svn properties on the files I set
